metadata.description: Claude Code plugins for multi-perspective analysis, session management, and collaborative decision-making

plugins.name: panel-system
plugins.description: Dynamic multi-perspective analysis with 3 core roles (Moderator, Analyst, Challenger) + recruited specialists. Analyst assigns 2-5 specialist agents with session-specific names based on topic.

plugins.name: memory-session-manager
plugins.description: Memory file maintenance and session capture/save workflow for multi-session AI projects. Provides /save command, automatic session watching via hooks, and memory-maintenance skill for frontmatter schema guidance.

plugins.name: local-review
plugins.description: Parallel code review with 4 specialized reviewers (security, logic, edge cases, style) plus validation pass to filter false positives.

plugins.name: output-styles
plugins.description: Switchable output styles for Claude Code responses. Includes 8 styles (ultra-concise, bullet-points, genui, html-structured, markdown-focused, table-based, tts-summary, yaml-structured) with /style command.

plugins.name: asha
plugins.description: Cognitive scaffold framework for session coordination and memory persistence. Provides /asha:init, /asha:save, /asha:index commands with automatic context injection, session tracking, and vector DB semantic search.
